00050 // ===========================================================================
00051 // method definitions
00052 // ===========================================================================
00053 bool
00054 TraCIServerAPI_POI::processGet(TraCIServer& server, tcpip::Storage& inputStorage,
00055                                tcpip::Storage& outputStorage) {
00056     std::string warning = ""; // additional description for response
00057     // variable & id
00058     int variable = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00059     std::string id = inputStorage.readString();
00060     // check variable
00061     if (variable != ID_LIST && variable != VAR_TYPE && variable != VAR_COLOR && variable != VAR_POSITION && variable != ID_COUNT) {
00062         server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Get PoI Variable: unsupported variable specified", outputStorage);
00063         return false;
00064     }
00065     // begin response building
00066     tcpip::Storage tempMsg;
00067     //  response-code, variableID, objectID
00068     tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(RESPONSE_GET_POI_VARIABLE);
00069     tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(variable);
00070     tempMsg.writeString(id);
00071     // process request
00072     if (variable == ID_LIST || variable == ID_COUNT) {
00073         std::vector<std::string> ids;
00074         ShapeContainer& shapeCont = MSNet::getInstance()->getShapeContainer();
00075         for (int i = shapeCont.getMinLayer(); i <= shapeCont.getMaxLayer(); ++i) {
00076             shapeCont.getPOICont(i).insertIDs(ids);
00077         }
00078         if (variable == ID_LIST) {
00079             tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRINGLIST);
00080             tempMsg.writeStringList(ids);
00081         } else {
00082             tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_INTEGER);
00083             tempMsg.writeInt((int) ids.size());
00084         }
00085     } else {
00086         PointOfInterest* p = 0;
00087         ShapeContainer& shapeCont = MSNet::getInstance()->getShapeContainer();
00088         for (int i = shapeCont.getMinLayer(); i <= shapeCont.getMaxLayer() && p == 0; ++i) {
00089             p = shapeCont.getPOICont(i).get(id);
00090         }
00091         if (p == 0) {
00092             server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "POI '" + id + "' is not known", outputStorage);
00093             return false;
00094         }
00095         switch (variable) {
00096             case VAR_TYPE:
00097                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRING);
00098                 tempMsg.writeString(p->getType());
00099                 break;
00100             case VAR_COLOR:
00101                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_COLOR);
00102                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(static_cast<int>(p->red() * 255. + .5));
00103                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(static_cast<int>(p->green() * 255. + .5));
00104                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(static_cast<int>(p->blue() * 255. + .5));
00105                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(255);
00106                 break;
00107             case VAR_POSITION:
00108                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(POSITION_2D);
00109                 tempMsg.writeDouble(p->x());
00110                 tempMsg.writeDouble(p->y());
00111                 break;
00112             default:
00113                 break;
00114         }
00115     }
00116     server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_OK, warning, outputStorage);
00117     server.writeResponseWithLength(outputStorage, tempMsg);
00118     return true;
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 bool
00123 TraCIServerAPI_POI::processSet(TraCIServer& server, tcpip::Storage& inputStorage,
00124                                tcpip::Storage& outputStorage) {
00125     std::string warning = ""; // additional description for response
00126     // variable
00127     int variable = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00128     if (variable != VAR_TYPE && variable != VAR_COLOR && variable != VAR_POSITION
00129             && variable != ADD && variable != REMOVE) {
00130         server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Change PoI State: unsupported variable specified", outputStorage);
00131         return false;
00132     }
00133     // id
00134     std::string id = inputStorage.readString();
00135     PointOfInterest* p = 0;
00136     int layer = 0;
00137     ShapeContainer& shapeCont = MSNet::getInstance()->getShapeContainer();
00138     if (variable != ADD && variable != REMOVE) {
00139         for (int i = shapeCont.getMinLayer(); i <= shapeCont.getMaxLayer() && p == 0; ++i) {
00140             p = shapeCont.getPOICont(i).get(id);
00141             layer = i;
00142         }
00143         if (p == 0) {
00144             server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "POI '" + id + "' is not known", outputStorage);
00145             return false;
00146         }
00147     }
00148     // process
00149     int valueDataType = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00150     switch (variable) {
00151         case VAR_TYPE: {
00152             if (valueDataType != TYPE_STRING) {
00153                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The type must be given as a string.", outputStorage);
00154                 return false;
00155             }
00156             std::string type = inputStorage.readString();
00157             p->setType(type);
00158         }
00159         break;
00160         case VAR_COLOR: {
00161             if (valueDataType != TYPE_COLOR) {
00162                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The color must be given using an accoring type.", outputStorage);
00163                 return false;
00164             }
00165             SUMOReal r = (SUMOReal) inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() / 255.;
00166             SUMOReal g = (SUMOReal) inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() / 255.;
00167             SUMOReal b = (SUMOReal) inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() / 255.;
00168             //read SUMOReal a
00169             inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00170             dynamic_cast<RGBColor*>(p)->set(r, g, b);
00171         }
00172         break;
00173         case VAR_POSITION: {
00174             if (valueDataType != POSITION_2D) {
00175                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The position must be given using an accoring type.", outputStorage);
00176                 return false;
00177             }
00178             SUMOReal x = inputStorage.readDouble();
00179             SUMOReal y = inputStorage.readDouble();
00180             shapeCont.movePoI(layer, id, Position(x, y));
00181         }
00182         break;
00183         case ADD: {
00184             if (valueDataType != TYPE_COMPOUND) {
00185                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "A compound object is needed for setting a new PoI.", outputStorage);
00186                 return false;
00187             }
00188             //read itemNo
00189             inputStorage.readInt();
00190             // type
00191             if (inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() != TYPE_STRING) {
00192                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The first PoI parameter must be the type encoded as a string.", outputStorage);
00193                 return false;
00194             }
00195             std::string type = inputStorage.readString();
00196             // color
00197             if (inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() != TYPE_COLOR) {
00198                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The second PoI parameter must be the color.", outputStorage);
00199                 return false;
00200             }
00201             SUMOReal r = (SUMOReal) inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() / 255.;
00202             SUMOReal g = (SUMOReal) inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() / 255.;
00203             SUMOReal b = (SUMOReal) inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() / 255.;
00204             //read SUMOReal a
00205             inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00206             // layer
00207             if (inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() != TYPE_INTEGER) {
00208                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The third PoI parameter must be the layer encoded as int.", outputStorage);
00209                 return false;
00210             }
00211             layer = inputStorage.readInt();
00212             // pos
00213             if (inputStorage.readUnsignedByte() != POSITION_2D) {
00214                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The fourth PoI parameter must be the position.", outputStorage);
00215                 return false;
00216             }
00217             SUMOReal x = inputStorage.readDouble();
00218             SUMOReal y = inputStorage.readDouble();
00219             //
00220             if (!shapeCont.addPoI(id, layer, type, RGBColor(r, g, b), Position(x, y))) {
00221                 delete p;
00222                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Could not add PoI.", outputStorage);
00223                 return false;
00224             }
00225         }
00226         break;
00227         case REMOVE: {
00228             if (valueDataType != TYPE_INTEGER) {
00229                 server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "The layer must be given using an int.", outputStorage);
00230                 return false;
00231             }
00232             layer = inputStorage.readInt();
00233             if (!shapeCont.removePoI(layer, id)) {
00234                 bool removed = false;
00235                 for (int i = shapeCont.getMinLayer(); i <= shapeCont.getMaxLayer(); ++i) {
00236                     removed |= shapeCont.removePoI(i, id);
00237                 }
00238                 if (!removed) {
00239                     server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Could not remove PoI '" + id + "'", outputStorage);
00240                     return false;
00241                 }
00242             }
00243         }
00244         break;
00245         default:
00246             break;
00247     }
00248     server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_SET_POI_VARIABLE, RTYPE_OK, warning, outputStorage);
00249     return true;
00250 }
